website_summaries.verdict: Carrying the DNA of a renowned classic sneaker, the Puma Clyde Core stayed truw to its origins when it comes to its comfort and style. With its timeless appeal and versatility, it has garnered the favor of most Puma shoes fans.
pros: Multiple reviewers point out that the Puma Clyde Core is great looking and stylish
A good number of buyers mention that the colorways of the shoe looks amazing
This rendition of the classic Puma Clyde offers good comfort for the foot, according to a couple of critics
One reviewer states that this sneaker is good for those who have high instep because of its lacing system
Some of the buyers are long time fans of the Puma Sneakers and they express that they are happy with this version of the classic Puma Clyde
cons: The Puma Clyde Core sneaker fits narrow as what one consumer noted in his/her review
Some reviewers have noticed that the shoe is not that breathable

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband and he absolutely loves them. I also just ordered a pair for myself because I loved his so much. Puma Clydes don't have the Puma stamp on the heel contrary to what other pumas have. These are real Pumas. They are made very well and I love the gold details. Puma has never disappointed. I have been a customer for over 20 years. Def buy these!
customer_reviews.author: We Like Quality!

customer_reviews.title: Seller might be up to some shenanigans.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very narrow. I bought a size 11 originally so I wanted to return and get a size 11.5. Too bad the 11.5 is $30 more than the size 11... it's like the seller knew the size 11 runs smaller than usual so people would have to go for the 11.5, and they made it $30 more expensive. I'm only saying this because I got another pair of pumas, size 11, the day prior to these being delivered, and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoes. PUMA had to be
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Loved them and the color is super nice. Funny because the delivery guy put the box under the carpet. Thanks I will buy other colors
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Mendez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BRAND GREAT SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: I always wore puma as a kid and these are awesome! Love the design aswell. They are comfortable but not as much as like a running sneaker just casual comfortable. The leather looks great. The sole looks like it'll last. I wear these every other day since I have other color pumas too.
customer_reviews.author: Steadfastgent

customer_reviews.title: Fits larger then expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe , arrived fast. Unfortunately the size 14 fits like a size 15. Too late to return them. My fault not the seller.
customer_reviews.author: JR.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a wide foot this isn't the sneaker for you...
customer_reviews.text: Always liked the appearance of this particular sneaker. Don't see it in stores much so took a shot on line. A high instep could wear this shoe no problem due to the lacing design but across the shoe is strictly D width only. I will be donating the pair I purchased, I am sure someone will get some got use from them. I'll stick to New Balance from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Classic Retro Pumas for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, great royal blue color and look, awesome price for Classic Puma kicks! No one has these anywhere around me.👍👍👍👍🥇
customer_reviews.author: Troy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: OLD SCHOOL COOL
customer_reviews.text: OMG......Just like the old days. They even come with two different colored laces. I’m a little bit older dad, even my son says they’re cool.....That’s all I need.✌️
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow, even after ordering a half size larger than usual
customer_reviews.text: These were too narrow for me despite my having ordered a half size larger than usual. I wasn't willing to try going up a full size. Bummer, as they look great and seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: great in fashion but unfortunately they run somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: Killer looks, great in fashion but unfortunately they run somewhat small. I suggest buying 1/2 size larger than your normal number...
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed one sneaker doesn't fit right waited 50 years for what
customer_reviews.text: I miss my feet are changing their sizes one bigger than the other that's what it feels like 1 sneakers fits better than the other waited fifty years for these kind of disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nicky De Risi

customer_reviews.title: Puma #1
customer_reviews.text: For my taste -and my feet, Puma has the best sneakers in the market. Good quality wherever you inspect them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning Puma fan.....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these shoes since seeing Walt “Clyde” Frazer play basketball for Knicks in the 70s. They fit great; feel great; and look great! My favorite go to every day sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Barrington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoe... very narrow....tight fit..maybe they need to be broken in ....
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes! They look great...very high end.
customer_reviews.author: Wea Wea

customer_reviews.title: great but inner heel not durable
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, but inner heel isn't made from durable material
customer_reviews.author: KemR

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These look great! I'm very happy with the fit and the workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: dgj

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Great Style
customer_reviews.text: Great style for the price you pay. Shoe laces are too short.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Puma Clyde’s are Wicked Classic!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great, and is very comfortable. The only complaint I have is the arch on the inside of the shoe is a little bigger than I’m used too. I like the inside of my shoes to be flatter in the arch area, but other than that, they’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: hard to clean mesh
customer_reviews.text: Tough and stylish shoeS. Heals and mesh clean easy with an old toothbrush
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mestayer

customer_reviews.title: Love my clyde's
customer_reviews.text: My clyde's are fantastic all four pair. Fit like a glove and shows me plenty of love. I'm a poet hahaha!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf Jihad

customer_reviews.title: Color and comfort are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely satisfied with my new pumas! I’ve worn them once, and I received numerous compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers had a bunch of wrinkles in the leather. It looks like someone had worn them. So I'm in the process of returning the sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. I was told to buy one half ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. I was told to buy one half size higher but still too tight. I replaced with 1 full size higher and it fits.
customer_reviews.author: David from Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is very stylish buyback little narrow but still comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic Puma with an updated tweak.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I intended. The exact color I needed to complete the look I wanted. Classic Puma look and quality plus the embossed logo update to make it pop and stand out. It's good to get compliments and these sneakers helped!
customer_reviews.author: Manny Torres

customer_reviews.title: Old school look
customer_reviews.text: Great product, old school feel but memory foam is a very nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer.. point blank period!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase and will buy more .. almost like the original Clyde’s from back in the day .. just need fat laces..lol
customer_reviews.author: Bryon Ward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: The color and fit are just what I hoped they would be. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Puma delivered quality as expected. I only buy adidas and Puma sneakers, because with these brands satisfaction is guaranteed! Sneakers fit like a glove, they're comfortable and the finish is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe. Too narrow!
customer_reviews.text: The length was as expected and was the right size. Shoes were entirely too narrow to wear. Sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Rhea D Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: A little rough where the little toe is in both right and left foot of shoe
customer_reviews.author: trevor h.

customer_reviews.title: Love them and will buy another pair in a different ...
customer_reviews.text: These came in perfectly brand new condition. They fit well and are well constructed. Love them and will buy another pair in a different color very soon.
customer_reviews.author: oldergamer65

customer_reviews.title: stylish and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: pain on ball of right foot after walking more than a few yards - not a comfortable shoe although stylish
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Reproduction!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a childhood friend who had a pair when they first came out. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: I love Pumas but sometimes they're too narrow or too flat for my arched feet. Love these so much I ordered a 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: matt bonitt

customer_reviews.title: It delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of this shoe,it looked the exact same way as it did in the picture
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Easy purchase and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: They are what I expected, they fit very well and are very retro
customer_reviews.author: Omar Cetina

customer_reviews.title: I’m a puma freak, been wearing puma since high school.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a puma freak, been wearing puma since high school. I love all my puma sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was extremely fast. Very impressed with the shoe, looks even better in real life than what it does on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: I am completely satisfied! I would buy again and again from them
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied! I would buy again and again from them!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Roth

customer_reviews.title: Didnt look geuine.
customer_reviews.text: These are missing the "Puma" trademark on the heel, the leather is lifting and wrinkled and they seemed to NOT be genuine. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Just an Everyman

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Incredible color and they go with a blazer I have of the same color
customer_reviews.author: jeff merkin

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Clyde Core Sneaker, Black-high Risk Red White, 3 UK
product_meta.description: The clyde combines a classic and stylish silhouette with the heritage and the legacy of clyde frazier. With design cues that reflect upon the old-school nature of basketball shoes, the clyde utilizes a mix of materials to showcase the shoe's class. - leather upper with nubuck leather formstripe - woven label on tongue - second set of laces provided within the pack
